mapper.sql: select t.*, cu.real_name create_user_name, uu.real_name update_user_name, war.name warehouse_name , res.name reservoir_name, from stock t left join user cu on t.create_uid = cu.id left join user uu on t.update_uid = uu.id left join warehouse war on t.warehouse_id = war.id left join reservoir res on t.reservoir_id = res.id
mapper.select: where t.id = #{id} and t.is_del is null

select.where:
t.code like '%${stock.code}%'
and t.name like '%${stock.name}%'
and t.is_del is null

mapper.insert: insert into stock (code, name, create_uid, create_time) values (#{stock.code} ,#{stock.name} , now());
